pr_title: [noTicket][risk=low] Task to delete workspace from Rdr export

timeline.message: Task to delete workspace fromrdr export
Use Test env if not specified

timeline.bodyText: Could you add "entry" here?  I suspect that some day in the future the words "deleting workspace X" may be scary.
timeline.author: jmthibault79

timeline.bodyText:
If you have a file like
id1
id2
id3
id4

This will delete each workspace entry individually.  Is that desirable?  We may want to collect all the workspace IDs in the file first.
timeline.author: jmthibault79

replies.bodyText: Good point, I think it will be better to collect it and then call delete function with group of 20 ids each. Rather than sending all together as the numbers could be high (In my case its about 500)
replies.author: NehaBroad

timeline.bodyText: Please add a log line after this one similar to the dry run
timeline.author: jmthibault79
